subject: Newbie Junit3.7 & JVM1.4
msgSnippet: hi all., I am a new user to junit. I recently installed the Junit 3.7 against jdk 1.4 After setting classpath and running the sample test this is the error i
messageBody:
hi all.,

I am a new user to junit. I recently installed the Junit 3.7 against
jdk 1.4

After setting classpath and running the sample test this is the error
i get...

C:\Junit>java junit.textui.TestRunner junit.samples.AllTests
.........................................
.........................................
.......E.
Time: 1.913
There was 1 error:
1) testClassLoading(junit.tests.TestCaseClassLoaderTest)
java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: junit.tests.ClassLoaderTest
at junit.runner.TestCaseClassLoader.lookupClassData
(TestCaseClassLoader.
java:124)
at junit.runner.TestCaseClassLoader.loadClass
(TestCaseClassLoader.java:1
01)
at junit.tests.TestCaseClassLoaderTest.testClassLoading
(TestCaseClassLoa
derTest.java:19)
at sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke0(Native Method)
at sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke
(NativeMethodAccessorImpl.
java:39)
at sun.reflect.DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.invoke
(DelegatingMethodAcces
sorImpl.java:25)

FAILURES!!!
Tests run: 90, Failures: 0, Errors: 1


C:\Junit>




I read the faq too Could not find anything abt this unfortunately...

Could some help me with this pls...

Thanks in advance

rk
